GoodThoughtsProvider - Class in server.goodthoughts
A provider for fetching random good thoughts from a file.The file should contain one good thought per line.If the file is not found or there is an error reading it, an empty list will be used.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class server.Server
The main method initializes the server sockets for each port and continuously listens for incoming client connections.When a client connects, it creates a new thread to handle the client's requests.

server - package server
 
Server - Class in server
The Server class represents a multi-threaded server application that listens for incoming client connections on three different ports and handles client requests concurrently.
